category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PlantBOPAllowedTemplates
preference.preference_description: Specifies the list of cloning rules available for cloning a plant BOP from a plant BOP.System administrators can configure new cloning rules for specific use cases and modify this preference to expose them as choices to selected users. Valid Values: Accepts one or more strings as values. Each string must be a valid cloning rule name.
